an5.138:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno nago bhattadako ca hoti okasapharano ca landasarano ca salakaggahi ca ranno nagotveva sankham gacchati.
an5.138:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno nago akkhamo hoti rupanam, akkhamo saddanam, akkhamo gandhanam, akkhamo rasanam, akkhamo photthabbanam.
an5.138:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato ranno nago bhattadako ca okasapharano ca landasarano ca salakaggahi ca, ranno nagotveva sankham gacchati.
an5.138:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhattadako ca hoti, okasapharano ca mancapithamaddano ca salakaggahi ca, bhikkhutveva sankham gacchati.
an5.138:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rupanam, akkhamo saddanam, akkhamo gandhanam, akkhamo rasanam, akkhamo photthabbanam.
an5.138:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhattadako ca hoti okasapharano ca mancapithamaddano ca salakaggahi ca, bhikkhutveva sankham gacchati”ti.
